description: CRI color rendering : >92. Luminescence efficiency : 90 Lm/W.

description: Using advanced COB LED semiconductor technology.

Instant start, high brightness, soft, no flicker, no harm to eyes. 
High color rendering index (CRI), for true color, CRI≥70. 
Long life 1000 hours.
description2: Aluminum frame is durable and aesthetically pleasing. No UV rays, no mercury, environmentally friendly.
